listData.name: Fixed Rate Home Loan
listData.description: You don't need a fortune teller to find out what the future looks like. A fixed rate home loan gives you the certainty of knowing exactly what your repayments will be for a certain term, while protecting yourself against any potential interest rate rises. And with great interest rates across our range of terms, that certainty comes with a smile.

features.additionalInfo: Repayment type : Principal and Interest OR Interest only (same term as fixed period and subject to approval)
Repayment options -Weekly/ Fortnightly/ Monthly
2-5 year fixed rate terms, 30 year maximum loan term
Additional repayments - up to $10,000 annually without penalty

Maximum loan amount -Borrow up to 90% of property value for discount offers, inclusive of LMI OR Borrow up to 95% of the property value, inclusive of LMI* (Principal and Interest Lending) or 90% of the property value, excluding LMI* (Interest Only Lending) for Owner Occupiers OR Borrow up to 90% of the property value, inclusive of LMI* (Principal and Interest or Interest Only Lending) for Investors
No minimum loan amount

eligibility.additionalInfo: Be 18 years of age or older
Have never been bankrupt
Be an Australian citizen or permanent resident
Earn a regular income

fees.name: Break Cost Administration Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The Break Cost Administration Fee and Break Costs are charged in accordance with your Facility Agreement, and may be payable if: a fixed rate period is broken (by you paying out the loan or changing loan types or as a consequence of a default causing the full amount of the loan to fall due for payment), you pay more htan the total of your elected repayments plus $5,000 in any 12 month period during your fixed rate period, or a Break Cost event occurs and we make a loss from re-arranging our funding

fees.name: Government and other charges
fees.additionalInfo: Fees payable to third parties. Fees may include but are not limited to - Mortgage duty, Mortgage lodgement fee, Land title search fee etc. Fees may vary by state. Refer to your loan schedule for a complete list of third-party fees that apply to your account.

fees.name: Rate lock Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if you elect to lock in your interest rate on a fixed rate home loan. We will hold the interest rate for 100 days from the date we process your request after which the rate on the date of lending would apply.

fees.name: Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if a certificate of title or any security is requried to be produced to another financial institution.

fees.name: Security Release Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we agree (at your request) to discharge a security.

fees.name: Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever we give consent (following a request from you) to a change in security.

fees.name: Substitution of Security
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if we agree to substitution of a security for another security.

fees.name: Break Cost Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The amount is calculated in accordance with your Facility Agreement. The Break Cost Administration Fee and Break Costs are charged in accordance with your Facility Agreement, and may be payable if: a fixed rate period is broken (by you paying out the loan or changing loan types or as a consequence of a default causing the full amount of the loan to fall due for payment), you pay more htan the total of your elected repayments plus $5,000 in any 12 month period during your fixed rate period, or a Break Cost event occurs and we make a loss from re-arranging our funding

fees.name: Default Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable 10 days after a repayment date if you have not paid your repayment or any other payment in full on or before that repayment date. A further default fee is payable 10 days after the repayment date in each subsequent month until all overdue amounts are paid.

fees.name: Monthly Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Discounts may apply in some cases. Refer to your Loan schedule for details.

listData.name: Kids Savings Account
listData.description: It's never too early to teach kids to save! Encourage the right saving behaviour for children under 14 with a children's savings account held in their name. Make one withdrawal a month and still earn Bonus Interest variable rate. Start earning high interest from the first dollar. Deposit only access for the linked child. Manage the account on your internet banking.

features.additionalInfo: A Smart Saver savings account with BOQ comes with the myBOQ app - the banking app designed to make your everyday banking easier.

Enjoy bonus interest each month when you meet the criteria. Simply deposit a minimum of $1,000 into your linked Everyday Account from an external bank account (cash and cheques excluded) and make 5 eligible transactions to save faster!
All deposits up to $250,000 are protected by the Federal Government's deposit guarantee, so your savings are secure with us
Your account automatically comes with an Everyday transaction account. It's the perfect match to help you manage your money
We've made monthly account keeping fees a thing of the past. We want your savings to grow.
Make every cent count. Open multiple Smart Saver accounts to manage your savings across multiple goals.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Except to the extent that an interest free period applies, you must pay interest on everything charged to your account. Interest is charged monthly at the end of each statement period. We calculate interest for each balance type at its applicable APR for each statement period. The APR (Annual Percentage Rate) that applies to each balance type (e.g. a balance transfer) also applies to related fees and interest. The Retail APR applies to retail purchase balance. To calculate that interest, we multiply the applicable daily percentage rate by the daily unpaid balance of its balance type (including related fees and interest) for each day of that statement period, and then add those amounts together. The daily percentage rate is the applicable APR divided by 365. Information on any APR is available on request.
